sentences.sContent: In all, the nitrogen and carbon ligands, to be effective, require linkage to other electronegative centers.
sentences.sContent_eng: In all, the nitrogen and carbon ligands, to be effective, require linkage to other electronegative centers.
sentences.sCn: 总的来说，氮和碳配体如要有效，就需要连接上其它电负性中心。

sentences.sContent: This is useful to make a linkage and validate the relations between the Personas and the actual system actors that are determined (or possibly reverse-engineered) during the analysis phase.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is useful to make a linkage and validate the relations between the Personas and the actual system actors that are determined (or possibly reverse-engineered) during the analysis phase.
sentences.sCn: 建立连接并验证角色和分析阶段中确定的（或者可能是反向工程）实际系统参与者之间的关系是有用的。

phrases.pCn: 转向连杆；转向联动装置
前向联系；前向连锁；向前边锁率

words.tran: 连接的；联合的；显示连环遗传的
连接起来；联系在一起；将人或物连接或联系起来
